column5: We have our 1/1 guesthouse available for those traveling through the Texas Hill Country. Located in the Hill Country near Sisterdale, Texas on 2.5 acres, it's close enough to visit local attractions, but far enough to escape.   The famous Luckenbach, Texas is 10 miles north of our location. And, we are approximately 25 minutes to Boerne, Comfort, Fredericksburg, Blanco, and 1 hour from San Antonio. This unique opportunity is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
column8: Texas Hill Country Boerne / Luckenbach Suite
